attributes.action: Make School starts at 10:00am and ends at 3:00pm
attributes.additional_details: High school students are issued late detentions. However, with buses running late, brains running on caffiene and broken alarm clocks, waking up early isnt for teenager they need there rest.Students deserve the chance to begin their day feeling awake. Early mornings leave many tired and unfocused,making it harder for them to do there best.A later start would create a calm & positive environment where evryone can think clearly,particpates fully and enjoy coming to school everyday.
attributes.background:
Every morning, students make themselves wake up at 6 just to get ready in time for school. Their heads ache, eyes sting, and they move throughout the school as ghosts waiting to go home. If school started at 10, maybe they'd enjoy school again and finally feel alive.
Help make school more enjoyable

rejection.details: The Government sets minimum hours for the week/year but it is for schools to decide the timings of the school day.
